title: Profit Margin & Break-Even Analyzer
subtitle: Understand unit economics fast: margin, break-even units, and revenue visualized.
paragraphs: This tool lets you explore how pricing, variable cost, and fixed cost structure interact. Adjust inputs to immediately see break-even units and revenue shift.
Use it early in product planning to validate whether your assumed contribution margin can realistically cover fixed overhead within your target sales volume.
Tip: A very high break-even unit count relative to your realistic monthly capacity is an early signal to revisit pricing, lower variable costs, or reduce fixed expenses.
